title: Blueprint model
description: SQLAlchemy Blueprint with project/document FKs, status/version, primary/parent/replaced relationships, plan_nodes relationship, timestamps.

title: PlanNode model
description: PlanNode with blueprint FK, parent, kind/title/summary, doc anchors and offsets, order_index, status/priority/estimate/risk, extra_metadata, linked_task_id and indexes.

title: PlanNodeTaskLink model
description: Join table linking PlanNodes to Tasks with weight to support 1-N relationships.

title: TaskDependency model
description: TaskDependency with task_id and depends_on_task_id plus index for dependency graph.

title: BlueprintIngestionJob model
description: Tracks ingestion progress for blueprint plan generation with status, counts, error_message, timestamps.

title: Project.active_blueprint_id
description: Project gains active_blueprint_id FK to selected blueprint.

title: POST /projects/{id}/blueprints
description: Create blueprint from document with optional base_blueprint_id and mark_active flag; versioning semantics.

title: GET /projects/{id}/blueprints
description: List blueprints for project including is_primary flag.

title: GET /blueprints/{id}
description: Return blueprint metadata, plan tree, and ingestion job.

title: PATCH /blueprints/{id}
description: Update blueprint title/description/status and optionally mark_active.

title: PATCH /plan_nodes/{id}
description: Update PlanNode fields such as title, summary, kind, status, priority, order_index, estimate_points, risk_level, extra_metadata.

title: POST /blueprints/{id}/generate_plan
description: Generate or regenerate PlanNode tree from blueprint document, optionally track BlueprintIngestionJob.

title: POST /plan_nodes/{id}/generate_tasks
description: Generate tasks for a PlanNode using LLM and link via PlanNodeTaskLink.

title: POST /blueprints/{id}/generate_all_tasks
description: Generate tasks for all feature/story nodes in a blueprint (heavy option).

title: POST /blueprints/{id}/compare_to_parent
description: Compare blueprint to its parent and mark changed nodes in metadata.

title: Blueprint ingestion pipeline
description: services/blueprints.py chunk→outline→merge flow to create PlanNodes with offsets, anchors, order_index, error handling.

title: PlanNode task generation helper
description: generate_tasks_for_plan_node creates tasks with metadata, links, dependencies from LLM output.

title: Plan tree UI
description: Tasks tab shows blueprint selector and nested Plan tree with status/priority chips and doc snippets.

title: Generate tasks button
description: UI actions to trigger POST /plan_nodes/{id}/generate_tasks and set active phase on phase nodes.

title: ConversationSummary model
description: conversation_summaries table with conversation_id unique FK, short_summary, detail_summary, last_message_id, updated_at.

title: ProjectSnapshot model
description: project_snapshots table with project_id unique FK, summary_text, active_phase_node_id, key_metrics_json, updated_at.

title: Conversation summary helper
description: update_conversation_summary that rolls summaries after N messages using fast/deep model.

title: Project snapshot helper and endpoint
description: refresh_project_snapshot builds summary doc + ProjectSnapshot and exposes POST /projects/{id}/snapshot/refresh.

title: ContextBuilder with ContextBundle
description: context_builder.py with dataclasses (PlanNodeContext, TaskContext, etc.) selecting plan/tasks/decisions/memory for chat.

title: check_alignment helper
description: services/alignment.py to score file edits/terminal commands with snapshot/plan/decisions context and return alignment JSON.

title: Snapshot UI surfaces
description: Docs tab pins snapshot doc; Notes tab shows snapshot card with status/metrics.

title: ExecutionRun model
description: execution_runs with project/task/conversation FKs, run_type, status, started_by, meta, touched_files_json, timestamps, indexes.

title: ExecutionStep model
description: execution_steps with run FK, order_index, actor, tool, input/output payloads, status, rollback_data, timestamps, index.

title: POST /projects/{id}/runs
description: Create ExecutionRun with validation of project/task and status planned.

title: GET /projects/{id}/runs
description: List runs for project with optional status filter (open/all).

title: GET /runs/{id}
description: Fetch run with ordered steps.

title: POST /runs/{id}/advance
description: Advance run with approval=approve|skip|abort and execute next step via worker wrappers.

title: POST /runs/{id}/rollback
description: Rollback touched files using rollback_data and mark run aborted.

title: runs orchestration helpers
description: services/runs.py with create_run, append_step, get_next_pending_step, mark_step_status, mark_run_status, rollback_run.

title: run_agent_with_tools and tool schemas
description: openai_client tool definitions for read_file/write_file/run_terminal/search_docs/search_messages and run_agent_with_tools mapping tool calls to ExecutionSteps.

title: Worker role wrappers
description: services/workers.py with run_code_worker/test_worker/doc_worker using role-specific prompts and allowed tools.

title: Diff and rollback capture
description: Before write_file capture original content/diff into ExecutionStep.output_payload and touched_files_json with rollback_data.

title: Command allowlist and forbidden substrings
description: SAFE_COMMAND_PREFIXES and FORBIDDEN_SUBSTRINGS enforced for run_terminal steps, gating approvals in semi/full auto.

title: Runs panel UI
description: Runs tab/panel listing runs and steps with status, alignment badge, approvals (approve/skip/abort) and diff viewer.

title: Project autonomy fields
description: Project fields: autonomy_mode, active_phase_node_id, autopilot_paused, max_parallel_runs.
plan_section: 3.1 Models (Phase 3/4 carry-over) and 4.1 Project autonomy settings

title: Intent classifier
description: intent_classifier.py classify_intent using model alias intent; integrated in chat endpoint before Manager handling.

title: ManagerAgent orchestration
description: ManagerAgent class handling start/continue runs, choose tasks, advance runs, explain_plan with heuristics and safety/autonomy rules.

title: POST /projects/{id}/autopilot_tick
description: Autopilot heartbeat endpoint that is idempotent and safe; uses ManagerAgent to start/advance runs or return waiting status.

title: GET /projects/{id}/manager/plan
description: Explain current plan/next tasks/runs for UI consumption.

title: Autopilot controls & heartbeat UI
description: UI dropdown for autonomy mode, pause/resume, status pill, heartbeat polling every 30–60s calling /autopilot_tick, with toasts/badges.

title: Task learning fields
description: Task fields: difficulty_score, rework_count, planned_phase_node_id, actual_phase_node_id, actual_started_at/completed_at.

title: PlanNode learning fields
description: PlanNode learned_priority, learned_risk_level, inferred_dependency_json.

title: ExecutionRun learning fields
description: ExecutionRun outcome and learning_notes fields populated after runs.

title: Blueprint understanding pipeline
description: services/blueprint_understanding.py producing architecture/foundations/sequence docs and annotating PlanNodes with learned fields.

title: Run outcome recording & retrospectives
description: ManagerAgent.record_run_outcome and periodic_retrospective/refine_plan methods updating learned fields and tasks.

title: POST /projects/{id}/refine_plan
description: Endpoint invoking ManagerAgent.refine_plan to adjust ordering/priorities using learning signals.

title: GET /projects/{id}/learning_metrics
description: Endpoint returning learning metrics (cycle time, difficulty, fragile areas, plan deviation, blocked tasks).

title: Learning metrics UI
description: UI card showing learning_metrics and button to call refine_plan.

title: embed_texts_batched & embed_batch helper
description: Centralized embeddings batching respecting MAX_EMBED_TOKENS_PER_BATCH and MAX_EMBED_ITEMS_PER_BATCH using embed_batch wrapper.

title: IngestionJob model and endpoints
description: IngestionJob with progress fields plus POST/GET endpoints for project-scoped ingestion jobs and cancel.
plan_section: T1.2 IngestionJob model for resumable ingestion

title: FileIngestionState hash tracking
description: file_ingestion_state table tracking sha256 per project/path for incremental re-ingestion.

title: BlueprintSectionSummary model
description: BlueprintSectionSummary per PlanNode with short_summary and detailed_summary updated during plan generation.

title: Windowed read_file
description: Filesystem read endpoint supports start_line/end_line to allow windowed reads for workers.
plan_section: T4.2 Code workers: windowed file reads

title: Budget/env knobs for embeddings and context
description: CONFIG_ENV and backend honor MAX_EMBED_TOKENS_PER_BATCH, MAX_EMBED_ITEMS_PER_BATCH, MAX_CONTEXT_TOKENS_PER_CALL, AUTOPILOT_MAX_TOKENS_PER_RUN.

title: Role alias env vars
description: Env vars OPENAI_MODEL_SUMMARY/SNAPSHOT/BLUEPRINT/PLAN_TASKS/MANAGER/WORKER_CODE/WORKER_TEST/WORKER_DOC/ALIGNMENT/INTENT/RESEARCH_DEEP defined.

title: get_model_for_role helper
description: openai_client implements _ROLE_ENV_VARS/_ROLE_DEFAULT_MODELS and get_model_for_role(role).

title: call_model_for_role usage
description: Subsystems call call_model_for_role for manager/workers/blueprint/plan_tasks/summary/snapshot/alignment/intent.

title: Embedding model default
description: get_embedding_model uses OPENAI_EMBEDDING_MODEL default text-embedding-3-small across ingestion/search/memory/blueprints.

title: Filesystem confinement
description: All file ops normalized and confined to project local_root_path (no path escape).

title: Terminal allowlist/forbidden commands
description: Terminal commands auto-run only from safe prefixes; forbidden substrings rm/del/git push/format/shutdown/reboot etc.

title: Approval gates by autonomy mode
description: Suggest: everything needs approval; Semi: safe reads/tests auto, writes/unsafe commands need approval; Full: auto except forbidden commands; rollback available.

title: Docs updates for new features
description: SYSTEM_OVERVIEW, SYSTEM_MATRIX, API_REFERENCE, USER_MANUAL, DEV_GUIDE, AGENT_GUIDE, OPERATIONS_RUNBOOK, TEST_PLAN updated for blueprint/runs/autopilot.

title: QA probes for blueprints and runs/autopilot
description: qa/blueprints_probe.py, qa/runs_autopilot_probe.py and smoke coverage added; TEST_PLAN scenarios H-Blueprint-01, H-Autopilot-01/02.
